tips.title: Pinch to zoom
tips.body: You can pinch to zoom on images and pan around

tips.title: Remove Ads
tips.body: If you go Pro, you can get rid of the Ads and have more room for images!

tips.title: Categories
tips.body: You can change categories by pulling the navigation drawer out from the left

tips.title: Restart GIFs
tips.body: You can tap an animated GIF to start it playing from the beginning again. Great for restarting to show other people!

tips.title: 5 Stars!
tips.body: Looks like you're enjoying Randdit! If so, please rate us as you see fit on Google Play.

tips.title: Download
tips.body: You can download images from inside the app. Check out the settings menu!

tips.title: 100 Images!
tips.body: You have viewed 100 images! That's awesome!

tips.title: Set Wallpapers
tips.body: Randdit Pro allows you to set images as your wallpaper from right inside the app! Works awesome in the Beautiful category.

tips.title: !!1000 Images!!
tips.body: Holy crap! You've viewed 1000 images! That's a lot!
